idea:
The company, BuziBee Technologies Private Limited, was incubated with the sole theme of “Re-inventing Customer Service”. The company was formed on 1st January 2015. BuziB, incubated by visionary woman entrepreneur with vast experience in customer servicing & was aptly invested by 3 serial Techno-Entrepreneurs.

The company envisages to bring Telecommunication & Digital interventions, which will be closely integrated with Enterprise processes/ applications & databases. These interventions will help enterprises to connect, engage, promote, brand building activities with its existing/ prospective customer base, efficiently & effectively.

In last 8 months, it has engaged 4 Senior Corporate professions from Telecom, Media, FMCG and Oil & Gas Industry. The company presently is under incubation mode and engaged in building partnerships, development of owned product portfolio, with special emphasis on Artificial Intelligence & Virtual Reality.

In last 6 months, with able engagement of these senior resources, signed up engagements with Google, Clickatell [For WhatsApp], GSMA [Global GSM operators Body], Vodafone Idea Ltd., etc. At the same time, have also filed for 2 patents & copyright.

The products envisaged by the Start-up are revolutionary & Innovative. The first line of product is lined up to be launched by 25th of March 2020
name: Buzibee Technologies Private Limited

idea: Home Cleaning products manufacturing in small scale to get reach each & every home in minimal price.
name: 3 Brothers Cleaners & Freshners

idea:
Credit One is a Non Banking Financial Company (NBFC) addressing working capital, digital payment & expense management needs of Fleet MSME's.

Founded by senior professionals from banking, payment & loyalty card industry and having combined industry experience of 100+ years as its base, Credit One is backed by strategic alliances with a Fortune 500 companies & world's most valuable startup.

As a speciality finance company, we provide customized credit line aligned to requirements of our customers. With our technical expertise at core, we provide solutions for efficient utilization of this credit line coupled with business control requirements of customers.
name: Credit One Payment Solution

idea: Rooted in its expertise in IoT and Data Science, Sesovera is a startup in the rapidly emerging field of Machine Learning at the Far Edge.
name: SESOVERA TECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Car Doctor India Private Limited ( brand name – “Car Doctor”) is a one stop online service provider for all luxury cars. We provide quick and convenient servicing as well as maintenance of luxury car at prices that are easy on your wallet and lengthen your luxury car's life.

We knows luxury cars can quickly become a money pit, especially when it comes their annual service or repairs. Car Doctor is a niche service that caters to all luxury car owners by offering repair and maintenance service at a fraction of a cost.

Benefits of Car Doctor - 

Car Service booking at a click of the button. 

Free pick & drop of luxury cars. 

Legitimate spare Parts. 

Certified mechanics with extensive experience in luxury car repair.

Quick turnaround time.

Comparatively lower costs.

Car Service as easy as CLICK - PICK - READY.
name: CAR DOCTOR INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
